resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105662</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105662</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">UNICEF World Heroes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unicef Welthelder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Héros du Monde de l'UNICEF</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heróis Do Mundo da UNICEF</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eroi Del Mondo del Unicef</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παγκόσμιοι ήρωες UNICEF</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Héroes Del Mundo de la Unicef</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Become a UNICEF World Hero. Since 1947, when a small group of committed citizens founded the U.S. Fund for UNICEF, volunteers have played a vital role in helping us change the world for the better. Today it is your turn to change the world.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Werden ein UNICEF Weltheld. Seit 1947 als 
eine kleine Gruppe festgelegte Bürger die VEREINIGTE STAATEN Kapital 
für UNICEF gründete, haben Freiwilliger eine lebenswichtige Rolle 
gespielt, wenn sie uns halfen, die Welt für das bessere zu ändern. 
Heute ist es Ihre Umdrehung, zum der Welt zu ändern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deviennent un héros du monde de l'UNICEF. 
Depuis 1947, quand un petit groupe de citoyens commis a fondé 
les fonds des ETATS-UNIS pour l'UNICEF, les volontaires ont joué un 
rôle essentiel en nous aidant pour changer le monde pour le meilleur.
Aujourd'hui c'est votre tour pour changer le monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Torna-se um herói do mundo da UNICEF. Desde
1947, quando um grupo pequeno de cidadãos cometidos fundou o fundo de
ESTADOS UNIDOS para a UNICEF, os voluntários jogaram um papel vital 
em ajudar-nos para mudar o mundo para o melhor. Hoje é sua 
volta para mudar o mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diventa un hero del mondo del UNICEF. Dal 
1947, quando un piccolo gruppo dei cittadini commessi ha fondato il 
fondo monetario degli STATI UNITI per il UNICEF, i volontari hanno 
svolto un ruolo vitale nell'assistenza noi per cambiare il mondo per 
il migliore. Oggi è la vostra girata per cambiare il mondo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γίνετε παγκόσμιος ήρωας UNICEF. Από το 
1947, όταν ίδρυσε μια μικρή ομάδα δεσμευμένων πολιτών το 
ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟ Ταμείο για την UNICEF, οι εθελοντές έχουν 
διαδραματίσει έναν ζωτικής σημασίας ρόλο στη βοήθεια μας να 
αλλαχτεί ο κόσμος προς το καλύτερο. Σήμερα είναι η στροφή 
σας για να αλλάξει τον κόσμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se convierte un héroe del mundo de la Unicef. 
Desde 1947, cuando un grupo pequeño de ciudadanos confiados 
fundó el fondo de ESTADOS UNIDOS para la Unicef, los voluntarios han 
desempeñado un papel vital en ayudarnos para cambiar el mundo para el
mejor. Es hoy su vuelta para cambiar el mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105662</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/unicef-world-heroes</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
